DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether target low arterial oxygen saturation day birth alters early ( first 3 month ) postnatal development control ventilation hypercapnic hyperoxic response preterm infant .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Targeting Lower Arterial Oxygen Saturations Development Control Breathing Very Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: To measure effect baseline oxygenation extremely low birth weight preterm infant : ) The early ( first 5 breath ) late steady state ( 3-5 minute ) ventilatory response CO2 ii ) The immediate ( < 1 minute ) ventilatory response hyperoxia iii ) The PCO2 apneic threshold iv ) The breathing pattern quiet REM sleep v ) The morphology periodic breathing cycle vi ) The incidence morphology sigh
DOC.criteria: Gestational age 23 0/7 27 6/7 week Enrolled COT trial Health Sciences Centre St. Boniface General Hospital Winnipeg Postnatal age 21 day 70 day Informed write consent obtain least one parent . Need mechanical ventilation , NCPAP O2 Sepsis know cause apnea .
